name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exec_action = #{execAction,jdbcType=TINYINT},
match_type = #{matchType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
keywords_list_id = #{keywordsListId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
keywords_list_name = #{keywordsListName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code_format = #{codeFormat,jdbcType=TINYINT},
security_rank = #{securityRank,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update strategy_content set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exec_action = #{execAction,jdbcType=TINYINT}, match_type = #{matchType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keywords_list_id = #{keywordsListId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, keywords_list_name = #{keywordsListName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code_format = #{codeFormat,jdbcType=TINYINT}, security_rank = #{securityRank,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(0) from strategy_content
and name like CONCAT('%', #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and name like CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and keywords_list_name like CONCAT('%', #{keywordsListName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and exec_action = #{execAction,jdbcType=TINYINT}

select from strategy_content
and name like CONCAT('%', #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and name like CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and keywords_list_name like CONCAT('%', #{keywordsListName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and exec_action = #{execAction,jdbcType=TINYINT}
order by gmt_create desc, id desc
select from strategy_content where id in (select strategy_id from business_strategy where channel_info_id = #{channelInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and type = 5)
